testcase.classname: Testing the fuctionality of an browser.
testcase.name: verifying the URL.
Checking the fuctionality for valid data.
testcase.system-out: Given User on the webpage "https://www.saucedemo.com/"......................passed And User passes the 'standard_user'.........................................passed And User enters the 'secret_sauce'..........................................passed When Click on the LoginButton...............................................passed Then User is navigate to product backlog page...............................passed

testcase.name: Checking the fuctionality for valid data. 2
testcase.system-out: Given User on the webpage "https://www.saucedemo.com/"......................passed And User passes the 'problem_user'..........................................passed And User enters the 'secret_sauce'..........................................passed When Click on the LoginButton...............................................passed Then User is navigate to product backlog page...............................passed
